svt_axi_master_callback Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_axi_master_callback:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Master callback class contains the callback methods called by the master component.

Member Function Documentation

 virtual function void
 svt_axi_master_callback::associate_xact_to_barrier_pair
 (  svt_axi_master axi_master , svt_axi_master_transaction xact , svt_axi_barrier_pair_transaction barrier_pair_xact [$]  ) 

Callback issued by master transactor when barrier transactions are enabled (barrier_enable is set to 1 in svt_axi_port_configuration class) and when 'associate_barrier_xact' bit is set to 1 in the svt_axi_master_transaction class.

 virtual function string

Returns this class name as a string.

 virtual function void
 svt_axi_master_callback::input_port_cov
 (  svt_axi_master axi_master , svt_axi_transaction xact  ) 

Callback issued to allow the testbench to collect functional coverage information from a transaction received at the input channel which is connected to the generator.

axi_master - A reference to the svt_axi_master component that is issuing this callback. The user's callback implementation can use this to access the public data and/or methods of the component.

xact - A reference to the transaction descriptor object of interest.

  function void
 svt_axi_master_callback::new
 (  string name = "svt_axi_master_callback"  ) 

CONSTUCTOR: Create a new callback instance
 Superseded functions 
 uvm_object :: new 
 uvm_callback :: new 

 virtual function void
 svt_axi_master_callback::post_cache_update
 (  svt_axi_master axi_master , svt_sequence_item_base xact  ) 

Callback issued by master transactor when there is a change in state of the cache.

axi_master - A reference to the svt_axi_master component that is issuing this callback. The user's callback implementation can use this to access the public data and/or methods of the component.

xact - This object can be of svt_axi_master_snoop_transaction type or svt_axi_master_transaction type. The type of the object can be inferred by casting the transaction handle to one of these types.

 virtual function void
 svt_axi_master_callback::post_input_port_get
 (  svt_axi_master axi_master , svt_axi_transaction xact , ref bit drop  ) 

Called after the master transactor gets a transaction from the input TLM port.

axi_master - A reference to the svt_axi_master component that is issuing this callback. The user's callback implementation can use this to access the public data and/or methods of the component.

xact - A reference to the transaction descriptor object of interest.

drop - A ref argument, which if set by the user's callback implementation causes the transactor to discard the transaction descriptor without further action.

 Superseding functions 
 svt_axi_master_overlapping_addr_check_callback :: post_input_port_get 

 virtual function void
 svt_axi_master_callback::post_memory_update_xact_gen
 (  svt_axi_master axi_master , svt_axi_transaction xact  ) 

Called before driving a data beat of a write transaction

axi_master - A reference to the svt_axi_master component that is issuing this callback. The user's callback implementation can use this to access the public data and/or methods of the component.

xact - A reference to the memory update descriptor object of interest.

 virtual function void
 svt_axi_master_callback::post_snoop_input_port_get
 (  svt_axi_master axi_master , svt_axi_master_snoop_transaction xact , ref bit drop  ) 

Callback issued by master transactor after pulling the snoop response from the snoop response generator

axi_master - A reference to the svt_axi_master component that is issuing this callback. The user's callback implementation can use this to access the public data and/or methods of the component.

xact - A reference to the transaction descriptor object of interest.

drop - A ref argument, which if set by the user's callback implementation causes the transactor to discard the transaction descriptor without further action.

 virtual function void
 svt_axi_master_callback::post_vip_randomized_xact_id_update
 (  ref int device_id_queue [$], ref int non_device_id_queue [$]  ) 

Called after the master transactor gets a transaction from the input TLM port.

This callback is issued whenever the VIP randomizes an auto generated transaction such as memory update prior to cache maintenance transactions. This callback is applicable if svt_axi_port_configuration :: single_outstanding_per_id_enable is set. The user can provide the list of outstanding device and non-device IDs through this callback. The VIP uses this information, in addition to its own list of IDs of active transactions, to ensure that the requirements as specified in svt_axi_port_configuration :: single_outstanding_per_id_kind are fulfilled.

device_id_queue - A reference to IDs of device type transactions.

non_device_id_queue - A reference to IDs of non-device type transactions.

 virtual function void
 svt_axi_master_callback::pre_address_phase_started
 (  svt_axi_master axi_master , svt_axi_transaction xact  ) 

Called just before driving the address phase of a transaction.

axi_master - A reference to the svt_axi_master component that is issuing this callback. The user's callback implementation can use this to access the public data and/or methods of the component.

xact - A reference to the data descriptor object of interest.

xact - A reference to the data descriptor object of interest.

 virtual function void
 svt_axi_master_callback::snoop_input_port_cov
 (  svt_axi_master axi_master , svt_axi_master_snoop_transaction xact  ) 

Callback issued to allow the testbench to collect functional coverage information from a snoop transaction received at the input port of the master transactor, which is connected to the snoop response generator.

axi_master - A reference to the svt_axi_master component that is issuing this callback. The user's callback implementation can use this to access the public data and/or methods of the component.

xact - A reference to the transaction descriptor object of interest.
